means: Swan Islands off Honduras 洪都拉斯对岸的天鹅岛

sentence.Network_en: A group of swans floated by.
The children went to feed the ducks and swans.
sentence.Network_cn: 孩子们去河边喂鸭子和天鹅.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Eliza was awakened the rustling of the swans ' wings as they soared above ., 艾丽莎醒来了 , 因为她头上响起一阵天鹅的拍翅声.
they have come to see the swans .他们来这里就是想目睹天鹅的风采。

according to a Greek legend , the soul of Apollo , the god of music and poetry , passed into a swan.So some people say the souls of all good poets passed into swans .据古希腊传说，天鹅的身体里有诗歌与音乐之神阿波罗的灵魂，后有人推而广之，说所有大诗人的灵魂都附在天鹅身上。
Oh , all his geese are swans ., 喔 , 他总爱自夸.

list.abs: 小天鹅（Little Swan） TB60-1068G（H） 6公斤波轮全自动洗衣机（灰色）360度喷瀑洗！全面洁净！
澳财长斯万(Wayne Swan)表示，澳东岸的洪水造成经济损失约192亿美元，是有史以来最惨重的一次自然灾害。 昆士兰州近两周以来…
《黑天鹅》（BLACK SWAN）拍于1942年，看海报好像一部古装艳情片，事实上，在好莱坞那个道德标准高于一切的年代，用我今天 …
位于天鹅湖（Swan Lake）入口处的维多利亚风格铸铁凉亭，据说是建于1850年代的一个老古董了。 已投稿到： 排行榜圈子前一篇…

entry.def: A swan is a large bird with a very long neck. Swans live on rivers and lakes and are usually white.
If you describe someone as swanning around or swanning off, you mean that they go and have fun, rather than working or taking care of their responsibilities.

example.ex: She spends her time swanning around the world...
example.tran: 她一个人自由自在地环游世界。

example.ex: The mother was widowed and had swanned off.
example.tran: 这位母亲成了寡妇，已经悠然闲逛去了。
